hypervisor¶

Compute v2

hypervisor list¶

List hypervisors

os hypervisor list
    [--matching <hostname>]
--matching <hostname>¶

Filter hypervisors using <hostname> substring

hypervisor show¶

Display hypervisor details

os hypervisor show
    <hypervisor>
<hypervisor>

Hypervisor to display (name or ID)
